description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0, and add proper error handling for division by zero. Also fix the add function which is incorrectly multiplying instead of adding. - Fix the add function to correctly add instead of multiply (bonus fix for code correctness)

metadata.solution_description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0, and add proper error handling for division by zero. Also fix the add function which is incorrectly multiplying instead of adding.
